meanings.sent1: The quarrelsome siblings always fought over the TV remote.
meanings.sent2: She avoided sitting next to the quarrelsome student in class.
meanings.sent3: The quarrelsome puppies playfully tussled over a chew toy.
meanings.sent4: The quarrelsome clouds clashed in the sky, creating a dramatic scene.
meanings.sent5: The quarrelsome neighbors could be heard arguing loudly every evening.

meanings.definition: Engaging in or prone to quarrels or arguments.
meanings.sent1: The quarrelsome team members couldn't agree on a project plan.
meanings.sent2: The quarrelsome couple bickered constantly about trivial matters.
meanings.sent3: The quarrelsome birds squabbled over the last worm in the garden.
meanings.sent4: The quarrelsome waves crashed against the shore in a tumultuous display.
meanings.sent5: The quarrelsome colleagues disrupted the meeting with their constant disagreements.
